original_text: And you, O son of man, behold, cords will be placed upon you, and you shall be bound with them, so that you cannot go out among the people.
korean_text: 너 인자야 보라 무리가 네 위에 줄을 놓아 너를 동여매리니 네가 그들 가운데에서 나오지 못할 것이라

sentences.original_text: And you, O son of man,
cords will be placed upon you,
and you shall be bound with them,
so that you cannot go out among the people.
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 네가 백성 가운데로 나가지 못하게 하려 함이라.
